A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this in the theater then rented at home\, through here and all the negative reviews are from people who did not understand this movie\, or did not want it to go their way. This movie is way better than I thought watching it the second time\, without all the preconceived biases I had because of all the negativity around it. Watching it with an open mind\, not only is this a great movie\, but it is most defiantly a Star Wars movie and holds true to the Star Wars paradigm! Don't let the naysayers distract you from watching this great movie and forming a preconceived bias against it. Rotten Tomatoes has the critics at 91% saying it is a great movie\, and they are right!
